New Records: England's 156 all out is the lowest ODI all-out team total in Bengaluru.
Key Match Events: England collapsed from 45-0 to 85-5, and then from 122-5 to 156 all out.
Ben Stokes was the only batter to cross 40, trying to hold one end up.
England's 85-5 is the lowest score at which they’ve lost their 5th wicket when batting first in a World Cup match since 1975.
Post-Match Reflections: The performance by England brought out lots of extreme reactions from the English cricket community.
